name: Eco City (itch) (Binus Game Development Club, StalemateZ, AngryCloud15, Coacher, squidhome, Gitroars, sacredyouma, Spicy Alien, Chika, sten-shoukaku, Kanzaki Makoto)
name_original: Eco City (itch) (Binus Game Development Club, StalemateZ, AngryCloud15, Coacher, squidhome, Gitroars, sacredyouma, Spicy Alien, Chika, sten-shoukaku, Kanzaki Makoto)
description:
PKM (Pengabdian Kepada Masyarakat) is a Binus Game Development Club (BGDC) work program aimed at producing games with educational themes for people around the world. This form is intended so that we can collect data on players who have downloaded our games and their countries of origin.

Find out more about us on our twitter page! https://twitter.com/pkmBGDC https://binusgdc.com/pkmbgdc22
